title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: On the Ethereum network, Bounce Finance offers an auction platform based on blockchain technology. Its native token is AUCTION. Also, a utility token also acts as a gateway to the crypto ecosystem. It is essential for the operation of the decentralized auction protocol platform and for protocol governance. For governance proposals, each AUCTION token is equivalent to one vote.Bounce works through the channels of (1) Bounce Finance (2) The Fangible (NFT) (3) Freelancer DAO (4) Bounce DAO Toolbar.Bounce Finance (AUCTION)’s circulating supply is 2,083,956 AUCTION while its maximum supply is 10,000,000 as per CoinMarketCap. Bounce Finance (AUCTION) can be traded on top cryptocurrency exchanges including Binance, Coinbase, Huobi Global, Gate.io, Mexc and others.Bounce Finance (AUCTION) Price Prediction 2022A price swing occurred at $12.75 resistance2 to $9.37 resistance1 for Bounce Finance (AUCTION) after touching the support levels at $6.45 and $3.89.The price was bouncing back from the support level of $6.45 and is now moving sideways and is expected to breakout from the sideways soon.Meanwhile, we predict AUCTION’s long-term price will stay bullish since it cannot break through the current support level anytime soon. We can expect AUCTION to reach above $40 in 2022.
